title: Build Golax Connect social media platform

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity authentication system allowing users to sign up and log in securely

quotes: User signup and login using Internet Identity

acceptanceCriteria: Users can authenticate using Internet Identity
Authentication state persists across sessions
Login/logout functionality works correctly

requirements.text: Create user profile system with name, bio, and profile photo fields that can be set during initial profile creation

quotes: Profile creation with name, bio, and profile photo

acceptanceCriteria: New users can set their name, bio, and upload a profile photo
Profile data is stored securely in the backend
Profile information is associated with the user's Internet Identity

requirements.text: Allow users to update and change their profile photo anytime from their profile settings

quotes: Yes, users should be able to update and change their profile photo anytime from their profile settings

acceptanceCriteria: Profile settings page includes option to upload new profile photo
Existing profile photo is replaced when user uploads a new one
Updated photo appears immediately across all views

requirements.text: Implement one-way follow system where users can follow anyone without approval, and unfollow anytime

quotes: Use a one-way follow system (similar to Instagram or Twitter). Users should be able to follow anyone without approval. Once followed, their posts will appear in the follower's news feed. Users should also be able to unfollow anytime.

acceptanceCriteria: Users can follow any other user with a single click without requiring approval
Follow relationship is immediately established in the backend
Users can unfollow at any time
Follow/unfollow actions update the UI immediately

requirements.text: Create post functionality allowing users to create posts with text content and upload up to 5 images per post

quotes: Allow users to upload up to 5 images per post

acceptanceCriteria: Users can create posts with text content
Users can upload between 0 and 5 images per post
Image uploads are validated to not exceed the 5-image limit
Posts are stored with associated images in the backend

requirements.text: Implement chronological news feed showing posts in newest-first order exclusively from users that the current user follows, excluding posts from users they don't follow

quotes: Show posts in chronological order (newest first) from users that the current user follows. Do not include posts from users they don't follow. The feed should be clean and relevant.

acceptanceCriteria: Feed displays posts only from users the current user follows
Posts are sorted by creation time with newest posts first
Posts from unfollowed users do not appear in the feed
Feed updates when follow relationships change

requirements.text: Implement like and unlike functionality for posts
acceptanceCriteria: Users can like any post
Users can unlike a post they previously liked
Like count updates immediately in the UI
Like state persists in the backend

requirements.text: Implement comment system allowing users to comment on posts and view all comments on a post
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add text comments to any post
All comments for a post are visible
Comments display author name and timestamp
Comments are stored and retrieved from backend

requirements.text: Implement user search functionality allowing users to search for other users by name
acceptanceCriteria: Search page includes a search input field
Searching returns users whose names match the query
Search results display user profile photos and names
Users can navigate to profiles from search results

requirements.text: Create profile page displaying profile photo, name, bio, followers count, following count, and a grid of the user's posts

quotes: Include a profile page showing: Profile photo, Name, Bio, Followers count, Following count, User posts grid

acceptanceCriteria: Profile page shows the user's profile photo prominently
Name and bio are displayed clearly
Follower count and following count are visible
User's posts are displayed in a grid layout
Profile page works for both the current user and other users

requirements.text: Implement Facebook-like layout with top navigation bar, feed page, profile page, and search page

quotes: Include a clean Facebook-like layout with: Top navigation bar, Feed page, Profile page, Search page

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation bar is present on all pages
Navigation includes links to Feed, Profile, and Search pages
Layout resembles Facebook's clean structure
Navigation is consistent across all pages

requirements.text: Apply modern blue and white professional social media design theme throughout the application

quotes: Use modern blue and white professional social media design

acceptanceCriteria: Primary color scheme uses blue and white
Design is clean and professional
Visual style is consistent across all pages
UI feels modern and polished

requirements.text: Display the platform name 'Golax Connect' consistently throughout the application including navigation bar and branding elements

quotes: The platform name should be displayed everywhere as 'Golax Connect'

acceptanceCriteria: Application name 'Golax Connect' appears in the navigation bar
Branding is consistent across all pages
Name is spelled correctly as 'Golax Connect' everywhere

requirements.text: Ensure the application is fully responsive and works well on both mobile and desktop devices

quotes: Responsive design for mobile and desktop

acceptanceCriteria: Layout adapts to mobile screen sizes
Layout adapts to desktop screen sizes
Touch interactions work on mobile devices
All features are accessible on both mobile and desktop

constraints: Use Internet Identity for authentication, not Firebase or other third-party auth
Backend must use Motoko on Internet Computer
Frontend must use React with TypeScript
Limit post images to maximum 5 per post
Follow system must be one-way without approval requirements
News feed must only show posts from followed users in chronological order
nonGoals: Native mobile app or APK generation
Posts from users not followed appearing in feed
